title: Shin Kamen Raidâ
plot: Shin Kamen Raidâ: Directed by Hideaki Anno. With Sôsuke Ikematsu, Minami Hamabe, Tasuku Emoto, Shin'ya Tsukamoto. Hongo Takeshi awakens to discover he has been transformed into a grasshopper-hybrid cyborg. Becoming the Masked Rider, he must fight the mysterious evil organization SHOCKER to protect all of mankind.
